articles.title: Local obituary: Morris ‘Morry’ Casso, 108, oldest known WWII veteran in Mass.
articles.description:
"A cancer survivor, at the time of his death, Morry was the oldest man in Massachusetts, its oldest living military veteran, and the 15th oldest man in the United States."

The post Local obituary: Morris ‘Morry’ Casso, 108, oldest known WWII veteran in Mass. appeared first on Boston.com.
